p: It is thought that combining transition metals with Pd improves its catalytic ability for oxygen reduction. Palladium alloys containing other transition metals have shown increased oxygen reduction efficiencies [ 7, 8, 9]. The addition of transition metals to Pd alloys alters the structural properties of the developed alloy, and the electronic bands of Pd exhibit different electrical charge transportation efficiency as a result of these structural changes [ 10, 11].
